value.description: The Pipboy is a wrist-mounted device used to control RobCo robots. It provides remote access, status monitoring, and direct command capabilities for all RobCo mechanized units.
A holotape for the Pipboy, used to expand control groups for RobCo robots. Insert into the Pipboy to upgrade your robot command capabilities.

A RobCo holotape implant which increases a mechanitor's control group count and the work speed of a mechanitor's mechs. This advanced sublink is encoded with proprietary RobCo firmware for optimal control and reliability. Can be installed up to 6 times for maximum effect.
A holotape for the Pipboy, used to optimize the gestation process for RobCo robots. Insert into the Pipboy to increase mech production speed.

A RobCo holotape implant which accelerates mech gestation in the gestator. RobCo's proprietary processor firmware ensures maximum efficiency and reliability. Can be installed up to 6 times for increased effect.

value.descriptionShort: RobCo holotape implant for faster mech gestation. Install up to 6 times.

value.description: A holotape for the Pipboy, used to optimize repair speed for RobCo robots. Insert into the Pipboy to increase mech repair efficiency.

A RobCo holotape implant which increases the speed of mech repairs. Direct neural interface and proprietary RobCo diagnostics allow rapid and reliable restoration. Can be installed up to 6 times for increased effect.

value.descriptionShort: RobCo holotape implant for faster mech repairs. Install up to 6 times.

value.description: A holotape for the Pipboy, used to project remote shields onto RobCo robots. Insert into the Pipboy to enable advanced shielding capabilities.

A RobCo holotape implant which allows remote projection of personal defense shields onto mechs. Proprietary RobCo firmware ensures reliable shield deployment. Can be installed up to 3 times for increased range and energy.

value.descriptionShort: RobCo holotape implant for remote mech shielding. Install up to 3 times.

value.description: A holotape for the Pipboy, used to enable remote repair of RobCo robots. Insert into the Pipboy to activate advanced repair protocols.
A RobCo holotape implant which allows remote repair of mechs. Proprietary RobCo firmware enables psychically guided mechanite restoration. Can be installed up to 3 times for increased range.

value.descriptionShort: RobCo holotape implant for remote mech repair. Install up to 3 times.

value.description: A holotape for the Pipboy, used to expand control groups for RobCo robots beyond standard limits. Insert into the Pipboy to unlock high-tier robot command capabilities.

A RobCo holotape implant which increases a mechanitor's control group count and the work speed of a mechanitor's mechs. This high-tier sublink is encoded with proprietary RobCo firmware for optimal control and reliability. Can be installed up to 6 times for maximum effect.

value.descriptionShort: RobCo high-tier holotape implant for advanced mech control. Install up to 6 times.
